component.name: GridScreenItem
component.script:
function itemContentChanged() as void 'print "inside itemContentChanged()" itemData = m.top.itemContent m.itemImage.uri = itemData.HDPOSTERURL 'm.itemText.text = itemData.TITLE 'print "itemData: "; itemData 'print "leave itemContentChanged()"
offset = m.itemImage.width - 32 m.statusImage.translation = [offset, 0] m.statusImage.visible = false
'print "___________________________________________" 'print "content type: "; itemData.ContentType 'print "m.global: "; m.global if(itemData.ContentType = 4 AND itemData.SubscriptionRequired = true AND m.global.enable_lock_icons = true) 'print "Subscription Required: "; itemData.SubscriptionRequired; " -- Title: "; itemData.Title m.statusImage.visible = true
if(m.global.isLoggedIn = true AND (m.global.UniversalSubscriptionsCount > 0 OR m.global.HasNativeSubscription = true)) m.statusImage.uri = "pkg:/images/iconUnlocked.png" else m.statusImage.uri = "pkg:/images/iconLocked.png" end if end if 'print "===========================================" end function
function init() as void print "Inside init" m.itemImage = m.top.findNode("itemImage") m.statusImage = m.top.findNode("statusImage") 'm.itemText = m.top.findNode("itemText") print "Leaving init" end function
